effect.en: Move a Pokémon Tool card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon (excluding Pokémon that already has a Pokémon Tool attached to it). (If an effect of this attack is prevented, this attack does nothing.)
Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
